segments.text: The sunlight filters through the window, casting a warm glow in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels inviting, yet there’s something incredibly tense about the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so wrapped up in drying the plate that she’s blind to the flood forming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the children are getting away with this; it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and every instinct in me screams for him to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like a disaster in the making; I feel my heart racing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice the water as it creeps closer to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, hand outstretched, fully committed to this cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her innocence is charming, yet it’s paired with a sense of recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a strange juxtaposition; the serenity outside paired with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
